titleStmt.title: Anatomy lectures at Gresham Colledge. By that eminent and learned physician Dr. Thomas Winston.
titleStmt.author: Winston, Thomas, 1575-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Daniel, for Thomas Eglesfield at the Brasen Serpent in St. Paul's Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: The imprint year is composed of turned 'C's'.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "ffeb: 1659"; the LIX in the date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
